zh.title: 比特币/美元技术分析：[震荡整理，等待突破]
zh.content:
当前比特币/美元(BTC/USD)处于90500美元附近，价格波动较小，显示出市场的谨慎情绪。近期价格在90545.57和90495.14之间震荡整理，投资者需关注这一区间的突破情况，以判断后续的市场趋势。

在技术指标方面，虽然RSI尚未提供数据，但MACD显示出-27.52381的负值，表明短期内市场情绪偏弱。SMA(20)为90524.67，价格在此均线附近整理，可能暗示短期内市场将继续维持震荡走势。若价格能有效突破高点，可能会引发买盘活跃。

支撑位方面，90495.14将是关键支撑，若跌破该水平，可能引发更深的回落。反之，90545.57作为阻力位，若突破将可能引导价格向91000美元发起挑战。投资者应密切关注这两个关键价位，以制定相应的交易策略。

建议投资者保持观望，耐心等待确认信号。在未突破关键阻力位之前，短期内不宜过度追高。若突破后可适量进场，止损设置在支撑位下方，以控制风险。

en.title: Bitcoin vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The BTC/USD pair is currently trading at 90,534.86, showing a slight increase of 0.03% over the past 24 hours. This price action indicates a consolidation phase, as the price is oscillating near the 20-day simple moving average (SMA) of 90,524.67. The high and low for the day at 90,545.57 and 90,495.14 suggest tight price ranges, reflecting a lack of volatility that may precede a more significant price movement. Traders should watch for a breakout above 90,550 or a drop below 90,490 to gauge the next direction.

In terms of technical indicators, the current MACD reading of -27.52381 indicates bearish momentum, though the absence of a signal line complicates immediate interpretation. Traders typically look for crossovers to confirm trend changes, but in this case, caution is warranted until further signals emerge. The RSI is not available, which limits momentum analysis, but the lack of extreme values suggests that the market is neither overbought nor oversold at this moment.

Support and resistance levels are crucial for making trading decisions. Immediate support can be identified at 90,490, while resistance is observed at 90,550. A break below the support could trigger further selling pressure, targeting the next significant support level around 90,400. Conversely, a breach of resistance at 90,550 could open the door to bullish momentum, possibly leading prices towards 90,600. 

For traders, a wait-and-see approach may be prudent until clearer signals materialize. Those looking to enter positions might consider setting buy orders above resistance or sell orders below support. This strategy allows traders to capitalize on potential volatility while minimizing risk exposure during this period of consolidation.
